article.h1: See the Latest Updates on Coronavirus (COVID-19)

a.alt: See the Latest Updates on Coronavirus (COVID-19)

img.alt: See the Latest Updates on Coronavirus (COVID-19)

h1.a: Arlington School Board Approves Proposed FY 2021 Budget

div.p: The School Board approved its Proposed Fiscal Year 2021 Arlington Public Schools (APS) Budget to fund operations for the 2020-21 school year. The School Board approved the Interim Superintendent’s Revised Proposed FY 2021 Budget, option 3, totaling $671.1, with several changes on Thursday.
School Board Member Nancy Van Doren will host the first virtual Open Office Hours on Mon, April 27 from 5-7 p.m.

h1.a: Virginia State Science and Engineering Fair Awards Announced

div.p: Congratulations to all the APS students who represented the Northern Virginia Regional Science and Engineering Fair at the Virginia State Science and Engineering Fair.

h1.a: Listen Now: Ep. 32 K-2 Instructional Packet Discussion

div.p: Learn more about the K-2 Instructional Packet and how it was developed in the latest episode of the What’s Up, APS? podcast.

h1.a: AETV, Dept. of Teaching and Learning Debut “At Home with APS” Video Series for K-2 Learners

div.p: Today, the Department of Teaching and Learning and Arlington Educational Television (AETV) released the first episode in a new instructional video series called, At Home with APS.

article.div: Congratulations to Mr. H @GlebePE for Teacher of the Year. Students in his PE classes feel safe & are more likely to try something new because Mr. H makes them feel good about themselves. #APSCelebrationofExcellence https://t.co/9eUmXV7pJN https://t.co/MdBVzppXGL

img.alt: Congratulations to Mr. H @GlebePE for Teacher of the Year. Students in his PE classes feel safe & are more likely to try something new because Mr. H makes them feel good about themselves. #APSCelebrationofExcellence https://t.co/9eUmXV7pJN https://t.co/MdBVzppXGL

article.div: Kudos to Leslie Argueta @Ashlawneagles for Teacher of the Year. Leslie teaches Art to Pre-K - 5th grade. She has a unique talent of finding artistic strengths in all students that walk through the door. #APSCelebrationofExcellence https://t.co/ok5yCYUAhl https://t.co/P3PGQnxbN8

img.alt: Kudos to Leslie Argueta @Ashlawneagles for Teacher of the Year. Leslie teaches Art to Pre-K - 5th grade. She has a unique talent of finding artistic strengths in all students that walk through the door. #APSCelebrationofExcellence https://t.co/ok5yCYUAhl https://t.co/P3PGQnxbN8

li.h1: At Home with APS: Early Literacy Edition: Episode 1

article.div:
Arlington Public Schools prohibits discrimination on the basis of race, national origin, creed, color, religion, gender, age, economic status, sexual orientation, marital status, genetic information, gender identity or expression, and/or disability. This policy provides equal access to courses and programs, counseling services, physical education and athletics, vocational education, instructional materials and extra-curricular activities. Report violations of this policy to the Assistant Superintendent for Administrative Services, 703-228-6008, or the Assistant Superintendent for Human Resources, 703-228-6110.
These webpages may contain links to websites that are outside of the Arlington Public Schools network. APS does not control the content or relevancy of these outside sites.
